snippet: Alan Sepinwall and Matt Zoller Seitz will collaborate on a book of essays for Grand Central Publishing about “the most artistically and culturally significant American dramas, comedies, miniseries, variety shows and more.”
abstract: Alan Sepinwall and Matt Zoller Seitz will collaborate on a book of essays for Grand Central Publishing about “the most artistically and culturally significant American dramas, comedies, miniseries, variety shows and more.”

headline.main: TV Critics Buddy Up for New Book
headline.print_headline: TV Critics Buddy Up for a New Book
